001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.controller;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import android.os.Bundle;
005import android.view.View;
006import androidx.activity.OnBackPressedCallback;
007import androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle;
008import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
009import androidx.core.view.GravityCompat;
010import androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout;
011import androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout.SimpleDrawerListener;
012import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
013import androidx.navigation.NavController;
014import androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment;
015import androidx.navigation.ui.AppBarConfiguration;
016import androidx.navigation.ui.NavigationUI;
017import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
018import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.ActivityMainBinding;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
022
023@AndroidEntryPoint
024public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
025
026  private ActivityMainBinding binding;
027  private LoginViewModel loginViewModel;
028  private NavController navController;
029  private AppBarConfiguration appBarConfig;
030  private DrawerLayout drawer;
031  private OnBackCallback onBackPressedCallback;
032
033  @Override
034  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
035    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
036    binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
037    loginViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this)
038        .get(LoginViewModel.class);
039    getLifecycle()
040        .addObserver(loginViewModel);
041    loginViewModel
042        .getAccount()
043        .observe(this, this::handleAccount);
044    loginViewModel
045        .getThrowable()
046        .observe(this, this::handleThrowable);
047    drawer = binding.getRoot();
048    setContentView(drawer);
049    setupNavigation();
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public boolean onSupportNavigateUp() {
054    return NavigationUI.navigateUp(navController, drawer)
055        || super.onSupportNavigateUp();
056  }
057
058  private void handleAccount(GoogleSignInAccount account) {
059    if (account == null) {
060      Intent intent = new Intent(this, LoginActivity.class)
061          .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
062      startActivity(intent);
063    }
064  }
065
066  private void handleThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
067  }
068
069  private void setupNavigation() {
070    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
071    navController = ((NavHostFragment) getSupportFragmentManager()
072        .findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host_fragment))
073        .getNavController();
074    appBarConfig = new AppBarConfiguration.Builder(
075        R.id.game_fragment, R.id.scores_fragment, R.id.ranks_fragment, R.id.settings_fragment)
076        .setOpenableLayout(drawer)
077        .build();
078    NavigationUI.setupActionBarWithNavController(this, navController, appBarConfig);
079    NavigationUI.setupWithNavController(binding.navigator, navController);
080    binding.navigator
081        .getMenu()
082        .findItem(R.id.sign_out)
083        .setOnMenuItemClickListener((item) -> {
084          loginViewModel.signOut();
085          return true;
086        });
087    onBackPressedCallback = new OnBackCallback(drawer.isDrawerOpen(GravityCompat.START));
088    getOnBackPressedDispatcher().addCallback(onBackPressedCallback);
089    drawer.addDrawerListener(new DrawerListener());
090  }
091  private class OnBackCallback extends OnBackPressedCallback {
092
093    public OnBackCallback(boolean enabled) {
094      super(enabled);
095    }
096
097    @Override
098    public void handleOnBackPressed() {
099      drawer.closeDrawer(GravityCompat.START);
100    }
101  }
102
103  private class DrawerListener extends SimpleDrawerListener {
104
105    @Override
106    public void onDrawerOpened(View drawerView) {
107      onBackPressedCallback.setEnabled(true);
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public void onDrawerClosed(View drawerView) {
112      onBackPressedCallback.setEnabled(false);
113    }
114  }
115
116}
